original_text: They get food to eat when the people bring their sin offerings to them. So the priests are happy when the people do bad things, because they get more food to eat.
korean_text: 그들이 내 백성의 속죄제물을 먹고 그 마음을 그들의 죄악에 두는도다

sentences.original_text: when the people bring their sin offerings
when the people do bad things
because they get more food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 더 많은 음식을 얻기 때문입니다
